General.Name: Sunlour Pigment CO.LTD.
General.Description: Sunlour Pigment CO.,LTD., engages in the research and development, production, and sale of phthalocyanine series and chromium pigments in China and internationally. The company offers phthalocyanine blue and green pigments that are used in various inkjets, offset inks, solvent inks, water-based inks, color pastes, photoelectric inks, coil coatings, mechanical coatings, architectural coatings, home improvement coatings, ship container coatings, road coatings, anti-rust coatings, automotive coatings, spinning masterbatches, plastic foaming, artificial leather, printing, packaging, construction, decoration, machinery, furniture, children's toys, and other plastic coloring products. It also provides chromium pigments, including chrome yellow and molybdenum red, which are used in coatings and plastics. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Xinghua, China.
